name: Dog Mountain
description:
Escape...

.. to a mountain top, over looking the Columbia Gorge in the Pacific North West.

There is an included soundtrack. I found the bomb-est classical/ royalty free joints I could find. Information is credited in game. There is one titled "She Rested" that gives a nice Fall-Out vibe.

I plan on doing a series on this concept, so check back soon for new locations. Since the war and treat of nuclear catastrophe, I thought it would be nice to catalog beautiful areas. Maybe one day people will need them to remember how things were.

Please comment on what you think could be improved to make this a better meditative experience.
